notes: Good HF decoupling; DC-bias significant; use multiple in parallel for HF loop.
Higher voltage MLCC for reduced DC-bias loss at 12V+ rails.
Good bulk at VIN entry; handles ripple current; higher ESR than MLCC but better bulk.
Used as bulk; high ripple current rating but larger ESR; temper with layout.
Low ESR/ESL, excellent lifetime; used when low impedance across wide band required.
